SessionEventTrigger.Name: Notify when guest sends message to unconnected session

TriggerAction.Subject: [SC] Your guest to session '{Session.Name}' sent you a message

SessionEventTrigger.Name: Notify when guest connects to unconnected support or meeting session
SessionEventTrigger.EventFilter: Event.EventType = 'Connected' AND Connection.ProcessType = 'Guest' AND (Session.SessionType = 'Support' OR Session.SessionType = 'Meeting') AND Session.HostConnectedCount = 0

TriggerAction.Subject: [SC] Your guest to session '{Session.Name}' has connected (EOM)

SessionEventTrigger.Name: Notify when an access agent disconnects

TriggerAction.Subject: [Control] Your access session '{Session.Name}' has disconnected
TriggerAction.Body:
The access session '{Session.Name}' has disconnected from your server.
Last Activity Time (UTC): {Session.GuestLastActivityTime}

SessionEventTrigger.Name: Notify when an access agent connects

TriggerAction.Subject: [Control] Your access session '{Session.Name}' has connected
TriggerAction.Body:
The access session '{Session.Name}' has connected to your server.
Last Activity Time (UTC): {Session.GuestLastActivityTime}

SessionEventTrigger.Name: Notify when a host connects to an access agent

TriggerAction.Subject: [Control] A host has connected to access session '{Session.Name}'
TriggerAction.Body: One of your hosts has connected to the access session '{Session.Name}'. Check your Audit page for more information.

SessionEventTrigger.Name: Notify when a new access client is installed

TriggerAction.Subject: [Control] New access session added
TriggerAction.Body: A new access session has been added to your Access page. See your Access page for more information.

SessionEventTrigger.Name: Notify when a server is online
SessionEventTrigger.EventFilter: Event.EventType = 'Connected' AND Connection.ProcessType = 'Guest' AND Session.SessionType = 'Access' AND Session.GuestOperatingSystemName LIKE '*server*' AND Session.HostConnectedCount = 0

TriggerAction.Subject: [Control] Server '{Session.Name}' is online
TriggerAction.Body: The server '{Session.Name}' is online and available on the Access page.

SessionEventTrigger.Name: Notify when a server is offline
SessionEventTrigger.EventFilter: Event.EventType = 'Disconnected' AND Connection.ProcessType = 'Guest' AND Session.SessionType = 'Access' AND Session.GuestOperatingSystemName LIKE '*server*' AND Session.HostConnectedCount = 0

TriggerAction.Subject: [Control] Server '{Session.Name}' is offline
TriggerAction.Body: The server '{Session.Name}' is offline. Check your Access page or Audit page for more information.

SessionEventTrigger.Name: Notify when an administrative logon request is sent

TriggerAction.Subject: [SC] '{Session.Name}' has requested administrative logon
TriggerAction.Body:
An administrative logon request has been initiated for {Session.Name}

â€Š

Session:

{Session.Name} ({Session.SessionID})

Guest Logged-on User:

{Session.GuestLoggedOnUserDomain}\{Session.GuestLoggedOnUserName}

Guest Machine:

{Session.GuestMachineDomain}\{Session.GuestMachineName}

Connected Host(s):

{Session.ConnectedParticipantNames}

â€Š

Request Reason:

{EventData.Reason}

Review Request

Or view more details here:

{$WEBSERVERADDRESSABLEURI}Host#Access///{Session.SessionID}/Select/AccessManagement

SessionEventTrigger.Name: Notify when an elevation request is sent

TriggerAction.Subject: [SC] '{Session.Name}' has requested elevation
TriggerAction.Body:
An elevation request has been initiated for {Session.Name}

â€Š

Session:

{Session.Name} ({Session.SessionID})

Guest Logged-on User:

{Session.GuestLoggedOnUserDomain}\{Session.GuestLoggedOnUserName}

Guest Machine:

{Session.GuestMachineDomain}\{Session.GuestMachineName}

Connected Host(s):

{Session.ConnectedParticipantNames}

â€Š

Request Reason:

{EventData.Reason}

Program Name:

{CorrelationEventData.ProgramName}

Publisher Name:

{CorrelationEventData.PublisherName}

Certificate Thumbprint:

{CorrelationEventData.CertificateThumbprint}

File Path:

{CorrelationEventData.FilePath}

File SHA-256:

{CorrelationEventData.FileSha256}

User:

{CorrelationEventData.User}

Groups:
